item.title: How I learned about Rocky Horror in fourth grade
item.description: I’m a millennial. Most of my generation learned about 70s American culture from parents or older relatives. Me, I’m a child of immigrants. And I grew up a quintessential geek. So naturally what I learned about the 70s came from the internet. Case in point, I learned about the Rocky Horror Picture Show in an online RPG, Barren Realms. What’s a MUD? Like most RPGs, Barren Realms asks you to create a fantasy-themed character.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Mingwei Gu, and this is my personal website and blog. I spent eight years at YipitData, a data-driven investment research firm in NYC. When I left, I was leading a multi-disciplinary engineering team developing tools and platforms for internal data analyst teams. Before that, I briefly worked in derivatives trading. And before that, I graduated from MIT with a degree in math with computer science. Currently, I’m exploring product ideas in the data engineering and analytics space.
